titleInfo.title: The concept of reference objects in the representation of natural language information in L-LILOG

mods.abstract: We present a brief description of the knowledge representation language L-LILOG. In particular, the concept of reference objects is introduced as a central means to build semantic representations for textual information. We describe how to construct internal representations as directed acyclic graphs and how to realize operations on reference objects to be performed in the process of constructing and utilizing semantic representations for natural language texts.

titleInfo.title: Proceedings of the ITL Conference on Expert Systems
